@cedmax Two small tips to foster a constructive tone: 1. Call it a "retrospective" rather than a "post-mortem". Unless your project had fatalities.ðŸ˜Ž 2. Swap the usual feedback groups of stop/start/continue for "I liked" / "I wish" / "I wonder" which invite more constructive thoughts.
